name: @legocss/css-reset
description: LegoCSS Reset package for resetting browser CSS

scripts.dev: node-sass --output-style expanded --source-map-embed src/index.scss dist/index.css --watch && postcss -u autoprefixer -r dist/index.css --watch
scripts.package: node-sass --output-style compressed --source-map-embed src/index.scss dist/index.css && postcss -u autoprefixer -r dist/index.css

author: morgantaylor
